price: 57. Abuuridda samooyinka iyo arlada baa ka weyn abuuridda dadka, dadka badankiisuse ma oga.
arabic: لَخَلۡقُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ ٱلنَّاسِ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lakhalqu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi akbaru min khalqi al-nāsi walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yaʿlamūna
